intro: You are Mickaël and you just inherit a company in New York from an uncle you barely knew. You are know in charge of Lovely, an online dating website. You arrive in your office, on top of a skyscraper, and this is how you realize that your life is going to change. You will have to make choices and to grant people's requests. RETOUR LIGNE. Fortunately, you are not alone in this: you have a great team to help you out! Especially Jenny, your secretarian, who doesn't leave you cold.  RETOUR LIGNE. Of course, the future of your company if important and thrilling, but don't forget... Money may not buy happiness.
end_win: You company went bankrupt. It has been bought by a competitor and doesn't belong to you anymore. RETOUR LIGNE. But your life is more peaceful. You decided to see Jenny again... And you two went back to France to live together. You thought your happiness was lying in your job and your company, where you were finding love for others... You discovered it was wrong when you decided to get your life back on track. You are now close to your family and ready to build one.
end_lose: Congratulations, your company is doing great and the shareholders could not be happier. Days pass by and look the same: you answer phonecalls and emails, you plan appointments, you fill in forms... You start to wonder if that boring life really is the one you want for yourself... RETOUR LIGNE. What about trying again, and this time you keep in mind that money may not buy happiness?

questions.description: The Innovative Teams Department wants you to hire a meeters team in charge of pairing members whose profiles are compatible. What do you do?

answers.label: Hire meeters
answers.comment: Despite a massive amount of administrative forms to fill in, a whole new team dedicated to connecting members has just been founded...

answers.label: Decline the offer
answers.comment: You don't have time to waste on damn boring forms: you decline the offer.

questions.description: The Technical and Meticulous Research Department has just developed a new compatibility algorithm. This would improve the current matching profiles system. But of course, that can't be completed without a significant amount of funding.

answers.label: Invest in the new algorithm 2.0
answers.comment: Bad news. Something got wrong with the algorithm and it had to be urgently removed from the website! s'est avéré raté et a dû être retiré du site en urgence.

answers.label: Do not invest
answers.comment: You prefer not to invest in the future.

questions.description: Jenny would like to organize a meal with the whole team for that "bonding with the colleagues" thing. Would you give up on your free time on Thursday evening to go with them?

answers.label: Dine with your colleague on Thursday night
answers.comment: It's good to take some time to relax.

answers.label: Decline to get some work done on Thursday night

questions.description: After so many weeks spent at work all day in front of your computer, your parents miss you! They want to take you out for dinner tonight.

answers.label: Leave the office earlier to have dinner with your parents
answers.comment: It's always nice to see the people we care for.

answers.label: Decline to get some work done

questions.description: The new and local magazine Megalow just contacted the Relationship Department to suggest a partnership. This magazine has a significant database on inhabitants of some areas in New York, but there are also lots of worrying rumours going round...

answers.label: Pay a detective squad to investigate that matter
answers.question: enquete

answers.label: Accept the partnership with no further investigations
answers.comment: The rumours seemed to be unfounded. Thanks to all the new data shared by Megalow, the website now aims at new potential customers.

answers.label: Decline the partnership
answers.comment: You decline the partnership with Megalow.

questions.description: The detective squad hired for the Megalow case is now ready to start the investigation. How should they investigate?

answers.label: Spy on the Megalow employees at their places
answers.question: enquete_2

answers.label: Sneak in the office at night
answers.question: enquete_2

questions.description: The detective squad could not find any proof of the rumours about Megalow. Do you now accept the partnership in order to get the magazine database?

answers.label: Accept the partnership
answers.comment: Thanks to all the new data shared by Megalow, the website now aims at new potential customers.

answers.label: Decline the partnership
answers.comment: You decline the partnership with Megalow.

questions.description: The Marketing Department is thinking big! The manager wants to set a press conference... From space! They sure want to show off.

answers.label: Take off to the stars!
answers.question: event_conference_espace

answers.label: Keep your head on your shoulders

questions.description: Finally, everything is ready. In a few moments, the first live press conference happening in space will start! Once again, Jenny is by your side, making sure that everything goes well. She waves at you: it's time to start your speech! RETOUR LIGNE. We are so proud to organize the press conference from space tonight. Our projects for the future are as dazzling as the stars!

answers.label: Announce a new project
answers.question: event_conference_espace_2

answers.label: Contemplate the Milky Way
answers.question: event_conference_espace_3

questions.description: It's crazy, it seems that the growth of Lovely does not really interest anyone... It seems that the announcement of your mobile app doesn't even move the crowd. RETOUR LIGNE. Minutes pass by and Mickaël is now day dreaming from his self-propelled office. But Jenny is smiling with confidence, and that smile reassures the young man. But suddenly a technical issue appears and disturbs the communication with Earth.

answers.label: Convince the technical team to try restoring the communication
answers.comment: It's chaos in the office! It makes you nervous and you get angry at your team.

answers.label: Be satisfied with this special time in space and go back to Earth
answers.comment: Going back to New York, your thoughts are still in space: you are deeply touched by this extraordinary journey.

questions.description: You feel small and stay quiet as you admire the scenery: the stars, the Sun and the Earth are all around you. They remind you of your childhood, when you used to look at the sky through your telescope. And if thousands of people stare at you through their screen without understanding why is there such a long silence in your speech, that's too bad for them.

answers.label: Go back to Earth

questions.description: Jenny seems worried about something. She finally tells you that her job takes her too much time and that she is not passionate about it anymore.

answers.label: Offer her a nice evening with friends to talk about it
answers.comment: This was a great idea: you spent one of the best evening of your life with her and discover she is not just an amazing colleague, but an amazing, caring and entertaining person.

answers.label: Give her a remarkable bonus
answers.comment: Jenny seems grateful but disappointed.

questions.description: It's Christmas! Usually, a big party is organized in the company where the employees and their children get presents. This merry event usually happens in some dedicated places where a huge buffet is set for everyone. It's true that this event is quite expensive, but your uncle used to cherish it.

answers.label: Organize the Christmas party
answers.question: event_noel_2

answers.label: Do not organize the Christmas party
answers.comment: Trouble is coming! The employees are very unhappy about the Christmas meal not happening and they start expressing their displeasure. Some of them even start to protest in front of the office. But they can do what they want, it won't affect your decision. No Christmas party this year for the company.

questions.description: All the employees want to give a hand to help you organize the Christmas meal. The party is in full swing when Jenny and your colleagues invite you at their table. But the dancefloor is calling you and the choice is hard!

answers.label: Take the dancefloor
answers.comment: Nobody was suspecting your dancing skills. Everybody joins you for a crazy night and the party will only end at dawn. You feel so relaxed that you even take care of the taxi bills for everyone of your colleagues. On top of that, you don't forget it's Christmas, and Santa is here to give presents to the kids.

answers.label: Sit at Jenny's table
answers.question: event_noel_3

questions.description: Spending time with your colleagues is always great. Plus, Jenny's company is a real pleasure. At the end of the evening, you ask her if she would like a ride home, and she accepts. But on the way, an idea comes to your mind.

answers.label: Suggest a helicopter night tour above New York
answers.question: event_noel_4

answers.label: Suggest a Broadway musical
answers.question: event_noel_5

questions.description: The view from the helicopter is so different from the New York you know. The City That Never Sleeps shines in yours eyes... And in Jenny's eyes.

answers.label: Go back home to sleep

questions.description: The show was so great you and Jenny are still daydreming about it when you go out of the room. This unique moment will stay on your minds forever.

answers.label: Go back home to sleep

questions.description: An idea just came across you. It has been ages since the last time the internal organization of your company evolved. Maybe changing it could improve the performance and give some motivation to your employees. First of all, what about the wages?

answers.label: Reduce wages in one way or  another
answers.question: event_organisation_2

answers.label: Increase wages to give the employees some motivation
answers.question: event_organisation_3

questions.description: The employees are very unhappy about the wage cut. Now, let's see what can be done with the offices.

answers.label: Renovate all offices
answers.question: event_organisation_4

answers.label: Let the offices the way they are
answers.question: event_organisation_5

questions.description: The employees are pleased with the new offices. Some of them even say that you might be the best boss in the country! Jenny can't hide how pride of you she is. Now, let's see what can be done with the offices.

answers.label: Renovate all offices
answers.question: event_organisation_4

answers.label: Let the offices the way they are
answers.question: event_organisation_5

questions.description: The whole building has been renovated and reorganized. Finally, the coffee machine on the 24th floor is working! It feels so great working in a new environment. Maybe it's just you, but it seems that everybody is more smiling today. Especially Jenny who seems to appreciate your part in improving the employees well-being. RETOUR LIGNE. What about going further in that direction?

answers.label: Organize monthly evenings in that fancy bar located at the corner of Fifth Avenue
answers.question: event_organisation_7

answers.label: Arrange one floor dedicated to relaxation
answers.question: event_organisation_8

questions.description: Renovating the building can wait. Jenny doesn't even try to hide her disappointment. RETOUR LIGNE. What about trying to improve the employees well-being?

answers.label: Organize monthly evenings in that fancy bar located at the corner of Fifth Avenue
answers.question: event_organisation_6

answers.label: Arrange one floor dedicated to relaxation
answers.question: event_organisation_7

questions.description: The first monthly evening was wonderful! Once again, Jenny surprised you by being such a fascinating woman.  You also took some time to talk with your colleagues, which was very enjoyable. RETOUR LIGNE. It is now time to begin a major project!

answers.label: Finance an interstellar signals launcher to send love messages to infinity and beyond
answers.comment: It was hard work, but worth it: Lovely is the first and only company who provides a possibility of sending love messages into space through their Love Among The Stars service. And who knows, maybe one day an alien will answer.

answers.label: Finance a scientific committee to identify matching profiles that would be so compatible they would marry even before seeing each other
answers.comment: That's unbelievable! Some members trust our experts so much that they accepted getting married to somebody they have not met yet. So this is it, science could find love for you?

answers.label: The price doesn't matter: you are offering a round-the-world trip to all of your employees!
answers.comment: You're really doing this, aren't you? Going for a round-the-world trip with 400 colleagues and employees! Who would have thought this was going to happend some day? Not you! But what matters the most for you right now is Jenny, who you are getting close to.

questions.description: Pool, cushions, hammockes, free sweets and game consoles are all settled in the relaxation floor! Only one detail remains: asking the three employees at the other side of the room to lower the volume when they watch La La Land. RETOUR LIGNE. It is now time to begin a major project!

questions.description: Your team informs you that a rooftop party will take place tonight in a building next to the company. They ask you to join them.

answers.label: Leave work aside and accept the invitation
answers.question: event_soiree_rooftop_2

answers.label: Stay at work

questions.description: It feels good to let go. There is only one street between this place and your office. It's just as if you were mocking your company.

answers.label: Dive into the jacuzzi
answers.question: event_soiree_rooftop_3

answers.label: Go get a drink
answers.question: event_soiree_rooftop_4

questions.description: The warm water and the laughing crowd make you happy. Jenny looks amused, it's true that you don't often let go at work. RETOUR LIGNE. Comfortably sat on the couch, waiting to dry, you start talking with Jenny. As you discuss, she puts things into perspective about your company that seems to control your life. Are you really happy since you got this position? Not being rich doesn't mean failing.

answers.label: Go home

questions.description: You find Jenny by the bar. It's the perfect occasion to get to know each other better. As you discuss, she puts things into perspective about your company that seems to control your life. Are you really happy since you got this position? Not being rich doesn't mean failing.

answers.label: Go home

questions.description: The Art Department recommends you to change the whole website design: from the logo to the headline. It is expensive but it is time to aligne the company to its competitors.

answers.label: Change the whole design
answers.comment: Your team has done a great job. The website looks way better now, and the headline is catchy: Live as a lover, live better. This is what success looks like!

answers.label: Keep the website the way it is
answers.comment: Fine, the website may not be that modern anymore, but it still does the job! That's what matter, right?

questions.description: There we are, this is the first shareholders assembly since you got your position in the company. You don't know anything about that but your team gave you great tips. You will be talking to major shareholders and they need to be convinced by the company's figures and your future projects.

answers.label: Explain the figures and reveal the new projects
answers.question: event_actionnaire_2

answers.label: Try a joke because they all seem tense
answers.question: event_actionnaire_3

questions.description: The shareholders seem satisfied by the figures but your projects are still too unclear for them. They ask you a lot more than just that.

answers.label: Get upset and explain that you are the boss here
answers.comment: They didn't expect such a reaction. Some of them understand, some others don't.

answers.label: Promise you will do your best
answers.comment: They seem happy with that answer.

questions.description: The shareholders don't appreciate at all this lack of seriousness. Some of them even express discontent.

answers.label: Show your discomfort to their solemnity
answers.comment: Some of the shareholders are offended, and the others are not convinced.

answers.label: Get a grip on yourself despite your disappointment
answers.comment: The shareholders seem satisfied.
